name: David
text: Stopped here on the way to church.  Everything about this place impressed.  My wife is always looking for good sugar free options and they had several and knew to check to if she wanted almond milk or another suger free creamer.  She loved her coffee and I loved the chai city latte.  Super comfy decor and furniture for sitting and talking.  Pass up the local Starbucks and get your caffeine fix here!

name: Emily Walker
text: OAT MILK! Okay, now that’s out of the way. Do yourself a favor and stop here! Delicious coffee and wonderful conversation. This small, family run business is the perfect pick-me-up for any day. Creative drink flavors that somehow work even when they sound like they might not.

name: Lauren Graf
text: An absolutely wonderful place! The menu selection is awesome and the vintage couches are super comfy. Fun games and books out on the tables. The lavender lemonade is the perfect balance of sweet and tart with the floral lavender notes. I’ll be coming back to this family coffee and tea bar next time I visit!

name: Deen Waddell
text: Our favorite place in Florence!!!! Delicious teas to be had here with interesting flavor combinations. Daughter loves the matcha lemonade with violet and lavender syrup 💜🍋💜🍋💜

name: Allen Blair
text: Great place! Good coffee and teas. I had a 12 oz Americano that was very good. They used the Bootlegger Blend (medium roast) from Prevail Coffee Roasters in Montgomery, AL. The Americano was $2.50. My wife and daughter tried the teas. They have lots of options on tea including some with lemonade mixed in. We enjoyed talking to one of the owners and will certainly try to visit again anytime we are in Florence.

name: Nicki Muhawi
text: You can tell that they love what they do here. And there is an appreciation for the art of coffee! Friend and I got a Chemex and an iced americano and both were great and made with care 😁

name: Chris Yang
text: Best coffee in town! Lavender and cayenne coffee is a must try.

name: Rebecca Wos
text: Great local coffee shop! New and still working on tweaking and adding to the menu, but great already. Many tasty options for coffee and tea - can't wait until there's more food items to pair with them. So glad you decided to provide another choice for coffee in Florence!

name: Joshua Thornton
text: Service is extraordinary here, and the coffee is magnificent.

name: Keith Jackson
text:
visited summer 2021

Wonderful little coffee shop.  This place has plenty of seating, for its size, and the drinks are great as well.  The cookie dough is very tasty.  All of the products are more hommade than other coffee shops, and the staff seems to really care about quality.  The staff was friendly, helpful, and everything seemed clean and well organized.  Would go again.

name: David
text: Stopped here on the way to church.  Everything about this place impressed.  My wife is always looking for good sugar free options and they had several and knew to check to if she wanted almond milk or another suger free creamer. text: Service is extraordinary here, and the coffee is magnificent.

visited summer 2021

Wonderful little coffee shop.  This place has plenty of seating, for its size, and the drinks are great as well.  The cookie dough is very tasty.  All of the products are more hommade than other coffee shops, and the staff seems to really care about quality.  The staff was friendly, helpful, and everything seemed clean and well organized.  Would go again.

name: Amanda Reyes
text: Great teas in a super cute shop. I only wish they were open more hours during the week!

name: Greg Randall
text: Friendly folks, good tea!

name: Opal Hall
text:
Great, friendly service. Healthier options for tea bombs, shakes, waffles and donut shots.
They have options to add to your shakes and drinks and different customizations. Having the cranberry, orange and goat cheese waffles. Low carb and low sugar options. A needed healthier option in Birmingham. They have a rewards program. Thanks for serving me and my son, and taking care to keep food allergies in mind.

name: Katherine Ballenger
text: My girlfriend and I love going to Iron City Nutrition. Our goal is to try every flavor, and at the rate we're going, we'll probably get there in a month's time. Each tea is just so good, and the people who work there are always such a pleasure!

name: Lyndsy Yim
text:
Pink Flamingo tea bombs are the best! ♥️
Iron City Nutrition is one of the cutest spots in Avondale with outdoor seatings. Owners are the sweetest as well.

name: Emilee Richards
text: It’s basically all Herbalife products, so if you’re not into that - beware! I think the business should be more transparent online and in-store on products they are selling.

resp.text:
Thanks for the comment Emilee. I’m not sure if you’ve been into our location or not, if not, I would love to invite you in. We do sell teas and shakes made with Herbalife ingredients. We do not hide that fact. If you are in store or you call and ask, we are happy to tell you what’s in any of our products. We provide nutritional facts and ingredient information to anyone who asks. Often times if someone has a question about what we are serving, I hand the the original Herbalife container so they’re able to see everything.

On top of that, we sell more than just items made with Herbalife. We are a pickup location for FitFive Meals, we sell oatmeal that isn’t from Herbalife and will be adding more non Herbalife food options soon.

If you have been in to see us, I would ask for suggestions on how we can be better and increase your rating. If you have not been in to see us, I would ask you to remove your review because you’ve unfairly given us 1 star without giving us a chance to serve you.

name: Lila Gamblin
text: Love the tea bombs and protein shakes. If you try one and it’s not your favorite the options are endless to try again. Love the atmosphere that is great for quick on the go pick ups but also has great places to sit and hangout. Definitely recommend!!

name: Carissa Custred
text: friendly staff and great environment to hang out while waiting for your drinks to be ready! Love the options of drink sizes and various flavors on the menu. You can tell how much work the owner has put into this shop! Highly recommend the ocean drive tea and caramel cheesecake shake 🤤

name: Chris Brown
text: This place is awesome! Andrew is terrific and knows how to make a good smoothie :)

name: anna rose mabile
text: i got the pink flamingo which was great and refreshing! nice, inviting, clean, and good parking! they have a punch card system for the mega teas which great i love a reward lol. will be back :)

name: Jesslan Wilson
text: Ocean drive tea bomb is awesome!! Super nice staff, great at giving recommendations for new flavors to try based on preferences. Definitely will be back!

name: Beverly Nash
text: Great service. Lots of drinks and snacks to choose from.  Highly recommend.

name: T C
text: This place sells Herbalife MLM garbage! Save your time and money because it's not healthy! Do a quick google search of Herbalife to see all the shady stuff about them!

name: Kristina Johnson
text:
My favorite place to stop in the mornings for my Loaded Tea addiction. Andrew is honest, genuine and knowledgeable about the products he uses. The atmosphere he has created in the store is welcoming and I could hang out all day if I could. I stop in every morning and love that he has "to go"  bottles and will make me one for my road trip.

I have noticed a difference in my digestive system and energy levels sine drinking tea from Iron City Nutrition.

If you are new to ICN, try a few of my favorite flavors:
Coconut Pina Colada
Banana + Pina Colada - tastes like a banana pop!!
Ring pop is another great one!!

name: Anna
text: Like many shops that are named [Location] Nutrition, this is a front for Herbalife products. Do your due research as there are a lot of stimulants in the teas and Herbalife is known to cause liver issues. Be wary.

name: Blake Wilson
text: Great teas and a cool place to hang out!!! Will definitely be back.

name: Joseph Phelps
text: Great place to get your energy fix in a refreshing drink.

name: Eris
text: Excellent Customer Service, Nice Vibe, Delicious Food!!!!!!

name: Dustin Ingram
text: Easy to miss from 1st Ave as it is tucked in a short strip, but do not be deceived! Piper and Leaf has a wide and flavorful selection of hot and iced teas, samples available, and answers for all your questions. They also have a beautiful gift sample set. The Briar Patch tea is so tasty. This will be a regular stop on every future visit to Birmingham, but I may also take to their website to supplement in the meantime.

name: Carrie Rollwagen
text:
The magic of Piper & Leaf starts with the tea itself — it's phenomenal. They use a lot of locally sourced ingredients, and the flavors are unbelievable. The Old Fashioned Birthday Cake really does taste like birthday cake (I even get the unsweet version, and it still tastes that way — I don't understand it, but I'll take it.) I also love their chais and their seasonal flavors — well, it's really all pretty great.

Piper & Leaf is famous for their jars of iced sweet tea and their flavor selection, but they can also do unsweet tea and any of their teas hot as well. They have teas available to order and drink, and they also have loose leaf and sachets available. (Their loose leaf teas come in bags that can also act as tea strainers in a pinch, which is pretty great.) The loose leaf teas come with instructions for how to brew a cup of hot tea, a jar of iced tea, or even as a bigger batch if you're brewing for a large group. This location has coffee as well.

I've always had the friendliest service at Piper & Leaf — they take time to hear you out, help you find the tea that will work best for you, and make sure you leave happy. I couldn't recommend them more; their fans are extremely dedicated, and for good reason.

name: Grace
text:
Piper and leaf has definitely set itself apart from all other tea joints. The first time I tried P&L was in Huntsville and I was extremely excited when I heard about the Birmingham location. We can all take pride in this locally owned business and their down to earth attitude! My first time visit to the Woodlawn location was very similar to Huntsville, great people willing to serve and fill you in on anything you would like to know about the tea! Sammy is a wonderful employee and very helpful.

I love that they keep their customers up to date via social media at all times.
It's always worth the trip and I look forward to their possible grand opening in August.

name: I Branch
text: really nothing but enjoyable experiences here, i'll be back. the place has a cool atmosphere. they have a lot of great reviews for a reason.

name: debbie berry
text: the staff was very friendly and attentive. the bill was reasonable.

name: Shane Oliver
text: Piper and Leaf - A little pricier than the grocery store stuff. Best tea I have ever had.

name: M Mishka
text: Love piper and leaf, so happy they opened up a store closer to me than their Lowes mill location. Awesome tea and friendly workers. Great place to drink tea and chat.

name: Mandy Nobles
text: Awesome tea! Great staff and lots of food choices at Pizitz.

name: P Hill
text: Tea was wonderful, staff helpful, and love specials.

name: Morgan Rouse
text: found them at the market at pepper place farmers market and fell in love with their teas. will definitely make this a frequent stop!!!

name: Caleb Townes
text: Small and upcoming shop, but that does not take away from the great and friendly staff. Not to mention the amazing tea

resp.text:
Caleb,
Thank you so much for the 5 star rating a lovely review! We still have a lot of work to do. Thank you for being part of our building and growth process. Reviews on Google, Facebook, Yelp, etc really helps small businesses like us be found. We appreciate you!
Connor and the Piper and Leaf family

name: Amy Johnston
text: Must try the strawberry teas

name: Alisha Miles
text: Delicious doesn't begin to describe the food. We ordered lunch and dinner to-go as we were passing through the town. The Kale wrap and Jack fruit BBQ sandwich are our top picks. Not only does this place offer amazing food, they are in this specific location to give back to their home community by offering healthy food. A great mission accompanied by delicious food and awesome service. I will be back soon even if I have to drive out of the way.... I may even plan a trip just to eat here again!

name: Duzle
text: The café itself is quaint and chill, and the lady who runs it is charming and lively! Street parking. The location is within their home community, to which they wish to give back by providing a healthy alternative such as this. I had the "millionaire 'burger'" along with sweet potato fries - quite tasty! It was piled high with veggies, avocado, and other add-ons. The burger look and texture was great. As usual with meat substitutes, you must treat it as a new kind of "meat" rather than compare it to actual beef. If you do this and let it stand on its own, this burger (along with other substitutes) tastes great. Next time I'm here, I want to try the jackfruit "pulled pork" and possibly a smoothie. This was my first vegan restaurant experience and it was quite lovely! Highly recommended for those hesitant on exploring this new type of cuisine.

name: Raisa Long
text: I've been here twice and each time was a pleasant experience. If you are in a rush, call in your order. The Happy Feelings Tropical Good Smoothie is the best. I've also tried the pulled pork sandwich which was surprisingly good if you're not vegan. Check them out for good healthy food.

name: Ellis
text: Very nice and welcoming people! Ordered previously through Grubhub and decided to go in store this time to order. Went to order cookies and left out with cookies and some cupcakes. I HIGHLY recommend!

name: Xena Saunders
text: It’s hard finding vegan food that’s well seasoned and flavorful, but by God this food was amazing. Seasoned perfectly- THE FLAVOR WAS IMMACULATE!! Not only was the food delicious, but the owner was such a sweet heart when we went to grab our food. We will definitely be back!!! Thank you so much!!!

name: Isabel Chen
text: My husband and I aren't vegan, but when we feel like our bodies need a "reset" we seek out vegan, vegetarian, or raw food. This place is a wonderful. Food was fresh and flavorful. We will be back for more.

name: Eddie Marroquin
text: Friendly atmosphere. Zen burger was epic! Never had anything like it. Jackfruit burrito was tasty. Kids chicken strips were delicious. Highly recommend.

name: Yakwanza Bantu
text:
Ate there one time...and kept going back, just being there makes you want to eat healthy....the environment is soothing, relaxing ,while you wait there's  great music playing  and the services is top shelf...wow.
Keep up the great work.

name: Sophia S
text: An amazing meal that will leave you smiling inside and out. We loved the fully loaded garden brat and whose health wouldn’t feel enriched while eating the millionaire’s burger! Great find and a very thoughtful and kind owner!

name: Theresa B Thomas
text: Great Service and Uniquely Delicious Meals and Healthy Drinks⭐💕

name: Carla Fergusson
text: Delicious food! I got the jackfruit sandwich and sweet potato fries. And chocolate chip cookies. The sauce that came with the fries was amazing! Good variety of menu options, really nice owner. Delicious cookies, I wish I’d bought more :) Thanks for a delicious meal!

name: Hot Damn
text: This was my first time trying them and everything was great! Love the BLT!

name: Julia H (Jules)
text: Love this place! Really good food! I got the jackfruit bbq sandwich! It was amazing and my friend got the millionaire burger and loved it! We’re going back ASAP!

name: Alexandra Shepherd
text: "Great food great deals awesome staff I love this place.

name: Kenneth R. Huff
text: After learning about this place from a friend, I had to try it out. I had the black bean burger and I have to say. It was the best burger I've had in a long time. The taste was out of this world! Also, the service was superb. I will be returning and I definitely recommend!

resp.text: Liberty Black Bean or Purple Black Bean are definitely to be considered!

name: Erika M
text: The food was very good! He was very nice and helpful while I was deciding what to order. I went with the burger and it was delicious! The food exceeded expectations and I will undoubtedly be returning. We're going to link back up and develop a meal plan and I'm going to eat Good Food To Be Hail for a week!

resp.text: Burgers are good, meals for a week engage the palate!

name: Timothy Casey
text: I cut meat out of my diet 7 days ago and never had a veggie burger before but I ordered the millionaire combo and it was fantastic! I know now that this will be a lot easier. David was very nice and helped me out on what to order knowing I was a beginner.

resp.text: Millionaires and Zen burgers are dynamic opportunities!

name: Aiden Shannon
text: Tried this spot already with a friend and I am hooked since then. I love the great vibes and delicious dishes and beverages. Keep up the good work.

name: Michael Busbin
text: It was an amazing burger.  The fries were out of this world.  Will be going here often!

name: Rachel Williams
text: We tried this at Vegan Fest in Avondale, so good definitely worth the trip. We tried 4 different menu options and had a pleasant experience beginning to end, furthered by how good we feel after eating! Owner was extremely nice and welcoming. Feels like your chilling at home while someone who loves you cooks. 110%

name: Kelli Vila-Rosa
text: Now I really should’ve taken a picture of my burger first, but I was so ready to give this burger a try I ate it! However I did share it with my niece, my mom, and my daughter as I’m trying to get our family on a better way of eating, a lifestyle change. I was so surprised and thrilled that they all said they liked it!! So from now on, well for now anyways, I’m going to treat myself to a different item once a week until I’ve tried everything on the menu and I will keep all of Bessemer posted.

name: Donreco Glaze
text: The Customer service was Great.. This Was By Far the Best Vegan Food I've Ever tasted in my Life...

name: Roderick Harris
text: My first was today, and it was awesome. I had the berry smoothies and kale veggie wrap that was oh soooo good!!!. Lots of healthy options and a lot of information if needed. I will definitely be going back ASAP!!!

resp.text: We have added some more healthy options, come see what we have to offer now!

name: KAMULAH KITT
text: Pleasantly surprised how good the healthy food was. Will definitely be coming back.

resp.text: We look forward to serving you the next time as well, thanks.

name: Batista ESDRAS
text: Excellent place good health results nice smoothies I would definitely send a friend there

resp.text: Appreciate your response and please do send your friends that are looking for healthy smoothies, thanks.

name: XclusivelyDoneEnt
text: Great place to enjoy REAL foood

name: Chef TréJ
text: Family owned business that is all about health! Had a fantastic vegan smoothie! Great place for Vegans!

resp.text: It truly is a great place for Vegan and for those that desire to just increase more raw plants in their diet, thanks.

name: Williamina Feagin
text: waited on quick. I found what I needed. A restaurant is inside this place

resp.text: We look forward to serving you in the future, thanks.

name: Vincent Flanagan
text: Very good and healthy food.Highly recommend.I will definitely be returning

resp.text: Good Health is in our name, it's our mission.  We look forward to serving you and others next time, thanks.

name: Scott Scroggins
text: Great food!  Delicious!

name: Blake Whitt
text: I honestly loved this coffee the first three weeks of them being open. But the last few times I’ve ordered a cold brew(which has been incredible in the past), I have received what I assume is nitro cold brew, but it tasted like club soda mixed with a funky coffee taste. Hopefully they figure out that something has changed and the cold brew does not actually taste like cold brew.

name: Bobby Lovell
text: Talk slow when you order.  Workers don’t seem to be trained or supervised. I discussed with the supervisor. Let’s see if they improve.

name: GARRY BARKSDALE
text: I had a Iced Coffee with a couple of extra shots this morning. It is wonderful..

name: Nicole Cecil
text: For a chain it's not bad coffee I enjoy the people who work there!

name: Rachel G
text: Great coffee and the employees are so nice!

name: Amanda Thomas
text: My new FAVORITE coffee shop!!!!... friendly, time efficient, and most importantly the ☕ is fabulous ☺️

name: Jean
text: This place is convenient being right off 72, but no one working there knows how to do T-Debit and it's very frustrating. The other one in Madison never has issues with it.

name: Sendero7mm
text: Always nice, coffee and sandwich was good as well

name: Kristian Campbell
text: Well I decide to go try this coffee out. Ask over 3 times for regular coffee. Guy proceeds to tell me it take 7 mins. Well isnt that your job?? Anyways i didn't get coffee I had to drink the coffee with caramel in it after telling him 3 times I want regular coffee I won't be back! He needs another job obviously! I told him 5 times i didn't like caramel as well! That might be why your drive thru is empty!

name: Doug Johnson
text: Great coffee and far far better than Starbucks. I just wish there was one closer by instead of driving from Madison to Athens!
